title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Jerry Jones Regrets, Giannis X-Factor, NFL COVID controversy
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Jerry Jones Regrets, Giannis X-Factor, NFL COVID controversy
description:
The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. Colin on the Bucks impending dynasty (1:00), why ignorance is no longer bliss when it comes to vaccines in the NFL (3:15), and why Giannis and the Bucks are great for the NBA (4:58). Dave Wannstedt on the never-ending Jimmy Johnson and Jerry Jones saga in Dallas (10:34). Ric Bucher on why not growing up in the U.S. has helped Giannis develop (16:35). Plus, Nick Wright on why Giannis now has to be considered the best player in the world (22:10). Make sure to follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates, and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
